name: Resume/CV & Cover Letter (Community)
description:
The cover letter is one of the most important things to have when it comes to getting a job in UX. It can really make all the difference! In this video, I walk you through my simple process of creating cover letters in just a few minutes using my Figma template.


Watch my video tutorial to learn how to use this template effectively https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ADBP2ZuyBQc
